entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who camped out at his friend's dad's place during school holidays. He also mentions that he got a place of his own after his uncle left him some gold.

entities.name: sirius' parents
entities.description: Sirius' parents are mentioned as being pure-blood and having a mania about their bloodline.

entities.name: sirius' brother
entities.description: Sirius mentions his brother as someone who believed in the importance of being a pure-blood.

entities.name: uncle alphard
entities.description: Uncle Alphard is mentioned as leaving Sirius some gold after he passed away.

entities.name: mr. potter
entities.description: Mr. Potter is mentioned as someone who invites Sirius to Sunday lunch.

entities.name: mrs. potter
entities.description: Mrs. Potter is mentioned as someone who invites Sirius to Sunday lunch.
